trans-unit.source: A static extension methods class for getting a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" /> instance from an <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 用於從 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" /> 執行個體取得 <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage" /> 執行個體的靜態擴充方法類別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage" /> from which to create the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 要從其中建立 <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage" /> 執行個體的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" /> instance from an <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" /> 執行個體建立 <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> instance can be read, written and copied just as a traditional <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessage> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>執行個體可以讀取、 寫入及複製就像傳統<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessage>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> instance can also "read" to retrieve the original <xref:System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage> instance by calling the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageExtensionMethods.ToHttpResponseMessage%2A> extension method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>執行個體也可以 「 讀取 」 擷取原始<xref:System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage>藉由呼叫的執行個體<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageExtensionMethods.ToHttpResponseMessage%2A>擴充方法。
